  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205435</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Home, Sweet Home: Lorraine Hansberry Theatre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Haupt-, Süsses Haus: Lothringen Hansberry 
Theater</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Maison À la maison et Douce : Théâtre de 
la Lorraine Hansberry</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">HOME Home, Doce: Theatre De Lorena 
Hansberry</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sede Domestica E Dolce: Teatro Del Lorraine 
Hansberry</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">"Οικία", γλυκιά "Οικία": Θέατρο της Λωρραίνης 
Hansberry</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hogar Casero, Dulce: Teatro De Lorena 
Hansberry</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">SPARK follows Jared "Choclatt" Crawford as he prepares for his foot-tapping new musical theater production "Hit It!" at the Lorraine Hansberry Theatre. This Educator Guide is about the history of drumming, street performers, and African American musical theater.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">FUNKEN folgt Jared "Choclatt" Crawford, während 
er sich vorbereitet für seine Fuss-klopfende neue musikalische 
Theaterproduktion "schlug sie!" am Lothringen Hansberry Theater.
Diese Erzieher-Anleitung ist über die Geschichte des Trommelns,
der Straße Ausführenden und des afrikanischen amerikanischen 
musikalischen Theaters.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'ÉTINCELLE suit Jared "Choclatt" Crawford 
pendant qu'il se prépare à sa nouvelle production musicale 
detapement de théâtre "la frappait!" au théâtre de la 
Lorraine Hansberry. Ce guide d'éducateur est au sujet de 
l'histoire du tambourinage, des interprètes de rue, et du théâtre 
musical américain africain.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A FAÍSCA segue Jared "Choclatt" Crawford enquanto
se prepara para sua produção musical nova pé-batendo do teatro "a 
bateu!" no theatre de Lorena Hansberry. Esta guia do 
educador é sobre o history de rufar, de performers da rua, e do 
teatro musical americano africano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La SCINTILLA segue Jared "Choclatt" Crawford 
mentre si prepara per la sua produzione musicale nuova diderivazione 
del teatro "la ha colpita!" al teatro del Lorraine Hansberry. 
Questa guida dell'educatore è circa la storia di rullo del 
tamburo, degli esecutori della via e del teatro musicale americano 
africano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο ΣΠΙΝΘΗΡΑΣ ακολουθεί Jared "Choclatt" Crawford 
όπως προετοιμάζεται για παραγωγή θεάτρων πόδι-τρυπήματός του τη
νέα μουσική "τον χτύπησε!" στο θέατρο της Λωρραίνης 
Hansberry. Αυτός ο οδηγός εκπαιδευτικών είναι για την 
ιστορία της τυμπανοκρουσίας, των εκτελεστών οδών, και του 
αφρικανικού αμερικανικού μουσικού θεάτρου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La CHISPA sigue Jared "Choclatt" Crawford mientras
que él se prepara para su nueva producción musical del teatro 
pie-que golpea ligeramente "la golpeó!" en el teatro de Lorena 
Hansberry. Esta guía del educador está sobre la historia de 
teclear, de los ejecutantes de la calle, y del teatro musical 
americano africano.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
